driver = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="72e5e8b9919622db1a3ec27aaaccad54ff815493")>

    def test_add_product_to_cart_and_verify(driver):
        login(driver)
        pp = ProductsPage(driver)
        pp.wait_for_products()
        titles = pp.get_all_product_titles()
        print(f"[DEBUG] Product titles available: {titles}")
        assert titles, "No products found"
    
        # click first add button and get best-effort product name
        first_product = pp.add_first_product_to_cart()
        print(f"[DEBUG] Clicked Add-to-Cart for: {first_product}")
    
        # open cart and collect items (cart is source of truth)
        cart = CartPage(driver)
        assert cart.open_cart() is True, "Failed to open cart"
    
        try:
            items = cart.get_cart_items()
        except Exception as e:
            items = []
            print(f"[DEBUG] cart.get_cart_items() raised: {e}")
    
        print(f"[DEBUG] Cart items collected: {items}")
    
        # Primary assert: cart should have at least one item
